article_title: Huckabee Splits With Trump on Immigration
article_text: Mike Huckabee made clear on Sunday that he sees some immigration issues differently than his Republican presidential rival, Donald Trump. Huckabee said on CNN's "State of the Union," "What I have been doing is focusing on what my own views of immigr USA TODAY

Mike Huckabee made clear on Sunday that he sees some immigration issues differently than his Republican presidential rival, Donald Trump.
Huckabee said on CNN's "State of the Union," "What I have been doing is focusing on what my own views of immigr USA TODAY
